modName: Tera armors - cfl02 cfl18 hefh16 Hefh19 - CBBE By Nausicaa
summary:
This is conversion of "Tera armors For Skyrim - UNP". Original author is Toad.

This Mod has Tera armors(cfl02, cfl18, hefh16, Hefh19) - CBBE 3.2.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i] [size=14]Introduction[/size][/i][/b]

I can't speak English well.

This is conversion of "Tera armors For Skyrim - UNP". Original author is Toad.
Original link : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27680/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27680/[/url]

These resources(meshes & textures) are the property of "En Mass Entertainment".

[color=yellow]I received permission from "En Mass Entertainment" & Toad.[/color]

This Mod has Tera armors(cfl02, cfl18, hefh16, Hefh19) - CBBE 3.2.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/1TQmn.jpg[/img]

[b][i] [size=14]Caution[/size][/i][/b]

[color=red]My skyrim version is 1.8.151. I made a esp file with newest CK.[/color]
[color=red]If your version is lower than 1.8, you have nothing in craft list, console(help command).[/color]
[color=red]You must update new version.[/color]

[color=yellow]The hair and the face of my screenshot is limited distribute mode.
I will not answer questions about this.[/color]

[b][i] [size=14]Description[/size][/i][/b]

Hefh16
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NPkol.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/yBD8k.jpg[/img]

Hefh19
[img]http://i.imgur.com/TxDOI.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gsed5.jpg[/img]

Cfl02
[img]http://i.imgur.com/52Dhd.jpg[/img]

Cfl18
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0vP2R.jpg[/img]

[color=yellow]It supports the body slider.[/color]

Here are armor, glove, boots & other parts.

I have a lot of parts were separated.
You can freely combine them,
In addition, some newly created

It is craftable & smithing at Daedric, DragonScale.
other parts are craftable at jewelry.

You can find that begin with "-cbbe-tera..".

[color=red]The previous version, I encountered a problem and hid.
You should delete the previous version.

Conversion four armor, and the rest of the conversion, I decided to provisionally suspended.

Terra armor, because there is too much.[/color]

[b][i] [size=14]Compatibility[/size][/i][/b]

It was created based on CBBE 3.2 default.
It is compatible CBBE3. (If you are CBBE3 user, you will use it without CBBE 3.2 body.)

[b][i] [size=14]Video[/size][/i][/b]

[youtube]gUv3I-LwVHw[/youtube]

[youtube]yifIwYMgc9I[/youtube]

[b][i] [size=14]Permissions[/size][/i][/b]

I've got permission from En Mass Entertainment & Toad.
Do not use it for any kind of way to gain profit, commericial purposes.
Do not distribute without my permission.


[b][i] [size=14]Credit[/size][/i][/b]

En Mass Entertainment - For Tera Online, Permission.
It's not my Mod. It's Toad's Mod.
author: Nausicaa
